description: Offline land surface simulations forced with ScenarioMIP SSP5-85 and SSP1-26.
rationale: Climate trend analysis. Offline land simulations of land surface states and fluxes allow for the evaluation of trends and variability of snow, soil moisture and land surface fluxes, carbon stores and vegetation states, and climate change impacts.

requirements.description: Scenario, from 2015 to the end of the 21st century.
requirements.label: 2015-2100 86yrs

requirements.description: SSP5-85 forcing data for offline land surface models running the L3MIP future simulations.  Data provided by the LS3MIP.
requirements.label: LMIPSSP5-85Forcing

requirements.description: SSP1-26 forcing data for offline land surface models running the L3MIP future simulations.  Data provided by the LS3MIP.
requirements.label: LMIPSSP1-26Forcing

requirements.description: A multi-ensemble of four simulations with two initialisations for each forcing scenario RCP4.5 and RCP2.6
requirements.label: RCP45RCP26x2
